content: this adult sized crochet beret hat is super easy to work up only takes 1 ball of worsted weight yarn and is super cute for all seasons lightweight with a pretty heart cross stitch detail this hat is sure to please pattern is one size fits most this is an easy level crochet pattern and the techniques you will need to know are single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet decrease chain stitch and slip_stitch
